other_tests.findings: WISC-R verbal IQ of 70 and performance IQ of 84 for Betty; verbal IQ of 84 and performance IQ of 100 for Jeff; Stanford-Binet IQ of 115 for Joe
Marked improvement in adaptive peer interactions, compliance, and bizarre behaviors with imipramine treatment
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvements decreased during placebo periods and increased significantly with maximal doses of imipramine
